summary: This is a U.S. Marshals Service prisoner schedule report for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated July 31, 2019. It lists inmates scheduled for court appearances, meetings with prosecutors, or other proceedings. The document is significant as it includes Jeffrey Epstein's scheduled status hearing on the day before his death, noting his 'Suicidal Tendencies'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as an inmate at MCC New York with a scheduled status hearing before Judge Berman on July 31, 2019; his special caution notes 'Mental Concerns: Suicidal Tendencies'.

persons.name: Jared Searles
persons.context: Inmate scheduled for court with an 'Other' reason; offense listed as Robbery.

persons.name: Lavell Durant
persons.context: Inmate scheduled for court with an 'Other' reason; offense listed as Robbery; has a security concern note regarding a force order from USDJ McMahon.

persons.name: Ethan Cave
persons.context: Inmate scheduled for court with an 'Other' reason; offense involves firearm possession and violent history; has separatee warnings.

persons.name: Andrew Moody
persons.context: Inmate scheduled for a status hearing before Judge Berman; has medical concerns (diabetic).

persons.name: Jamie Banks
persons.context: Inmate scheduled for a revocation hearing; offense is probation violation.

persons.name: Correa Yusty
persons.context: Inmate scheduled for a meeting with AUSA Neff for a proffer; offense listed as dangerous drugs.

persons.name: Jabari Isom-Jenkins
persons.context: Inmate scheduled for a meeting with AUSA Balsamello for a proffer; has a history of mental health inpatient treatment.

persons.name: Elizabeth Mccaskill
persons.context: Inmate scheduled for a change of plea before Judge Pauley; has mental health concerns (PTSD, bipolar, depression); offense is a weapon offense.

persons.name: Marlon Sisnero-Gil
persons.context: Inmate scheduled for a meeting with AUSA Lake for a proffer; offense listed as dangerous drugs.

persons.name: Keith Outlaw
persons.context: Inmate scheduled for sentencing before Judge Cote; offense is a weapon offense; has gang affiliation (BLOODS) and multiple separatee warnings.

persons.name: Luis Semiday
persons.context: Inmate scheduled for a meeting with AUSA Sassoon for a proffer; noted as armed and dangerous, with asthma and boxing training; offense is robbery.

persons.name: Jesus Gomez
persons.context: Inmate scheduled for a status hearing before Judge Crotty; offense listed as dangerous drugs.

connections.description: Judge Berman was presiding over Epstein's scheduled status hearing on July 31, 2019.

events.title: Epstein's Scheduled Status Hearing
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for a status hearing before Judge Berman at the MCC New York court.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at MCC New York with a status hearing scheduled for July 31, 2019, the day before his death.
The document notes Epstein had 'Mental Concerns: Suicidal Tendencies' as a special caution.
The prisoner schedule includes multiple other inmates with various court proceedings, proffer meetings with AUSAs, and detailed security/medical warnings.
The document is a routine USMS administrative record that places Epstein within the federal prison system's schedule on a specific date.
